author: neels
msg: Fix 'status' of file externals "resurrecting" a deleted file at the same path.
During read_children_info(), fetch the FILE_EXTERNAL column from the NODES
table (op_depth 0) and feed thru svn_wc__db_info_t --> svn_wc_status3_t -->
svn_client_status_t. (Add to the first two, already exists in the latter.)
Note: the FILE_EXTERNAL field once existed in svn_wc_status3_t and was removed
in r955755. By now, the FILE_EXTERNAL flag can be obtained much cheaper by
read_children_info() than by calling svn_wc__read_external_info() over&over.
Add FILE_EXTERNAL. It's a bool, no need to change svn_wc_dup_status3().
(read_info): Explicitly get file external status (direct targets only).
(assemble_status): Pass thru the new FILE_EXTERNAL flag.
(read_children_info): Return FILE_EXTERNAL flags, get from op_depth=0 rows.
